page.title: 07I.C.C.,Wrafton.
page.content: {I.C.C.(International Chemical Company) is a firm which is concerned with chemicals, toothpaste and toiletries. The factory was set up in{1913.}Their main headquarters are in Chenie Street in{Central London,in Devon {(Wrafton),Germany,Italy,Holland and {America}.Their brand of toiletries are called Anne French.Their products include moisturising cream,cleansing milk and many others.Medicines include {Anadin (analgesic tablets),Dristan {(decongestant mist) Anbasol(ulcer {liquid) Compound W (wart remover)}and a lot more.At the moment I.C.C.is having a very large extension built onto one it's laboratories.Also it has plans for more extensions.The factory itself does not have a great effect on the village,but it does employ a lot of local people.
